statements: SELECT * FROM team_tasks;
SELECT task_name, assignee_id FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, assignee_id FROM team_tasks ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, assignee_id FROM team_tasks WHERE assignee_id = 105 ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT task_name, deadline_date FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM team_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, assignee_id FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name, assignee_id FROM team_tasks WHERE assignee_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-01';
SELECT task_name AS TaskName, deadline_date AS Deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM team_tasks;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM team_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to FROM team_tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'Alice' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'Alice';
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline < '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM team_tasks ORDER BY assigned_to ASC, task_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_deadlines WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE AND deadline_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.task_name, d.deadline_date FROM team_tasks t INNER JOIN team_deadlines d ON t.task_id = d.task_id WHERE d.deadline_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM assignments;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT id, name, email FROM team_members WHERE id = 2;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM assignments WHERE assigned_to = 'Alice' ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline, task_status FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, name, email FROM team_members WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM team_members JOIN tasks ON team_members.name = tasks.assigned_to WHERE tasks.deadline < '2023-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'in progress'
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, assignee_id FROM tasks WHERE deadline > NOW();
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(member_id) FROM teams JOIN team_members ON teams.team_id = team_members.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_members FROM teams INNER JOIN team_members ON teams.team_id = team_members.team_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING total_members > 5;
SELECT task_id, task_name, assignee_id, deadline FROM tasks WHERE assignee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY deadline DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT u.username, t.team_name FROM users u INNER JOIN team_members tm ON u.user_id = tm.user_id INNER JOIN teams t ON tm.team_id = t.team_id WHERE u.email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM Tasks;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline FROM Tasks WHERE assigned_to='John Doe';
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to FROM Tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees JOIN Departments ON Employees.employee_id = Departments.manager_id;
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM Tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31';

SELECT Tasks.task_name, Employees.employee_name, Departments.department_name FROM Tasks JOIN Assignments ON Tasks.task_id = Assignments.task_id JOIN Employees ON Assignments.employee_id = Employees.employee_id JOIN Departments ON Employees.department = Departments.department_name;
SELECT task_name, COUNT(*) AS total_assignments FROM Assignments JOIN Tasks ON Assignments.task_id = Tasks.task_id GROUP BY task_name HAVING total_assignments > 1;
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM Tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%report%' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
